name: Nativery Plugin
author: Nativery Developer

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to add to your blog widgets created with nativery.com.

Including:

  • ability to add nativery widgets in sidebar, before and after the content

Remove plugin

  1. Deactivate plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. Delete plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

To do

More translations. Does someone wants to help?
sections.installation:
Install Via Plugin Repository

  1. Log into WordPress admin for your site
  2. Go to ‘Plugins -> Add New’ and choose ‘Search’
  3. Search for nativery and click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  5. Adjust settings

Install Via ftp

  1. Download the zip file
  2. Upload Nativery Plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Adjust settings
